title: Kekanto: Guia da cidade
summary: Kekanto - Bars, restaurants and hotels guide
description: ★ "Best of 2013 and 2014" at Google Play Brasil!Kekanto is your official city guide:★ Find the best in the categories restaurant, bar, club, outlet, store, culture, cinema, hotel, etc.★ Read reviews and tips about places★ It is your guide when you are traveling to other cities like São Paulo, Rio, New York, etc.★ Find discounts and deals from several establishments in the city or in your neighbourhood★ Order food delivery or book a tableGuide Kekanto is the best city guide, made by real costumers reviews that transform their cities with information about what is good and what is not. Download for FREE now!
descriptionHTML:
★ "Best of 2013 and 2014" at Google Play Brasil!

Kekanto is your official city guide:
★ Find the best in the categories restaurant, bar, club, outlet, store, culture, cinema, hotel, etc.
★ Read reviews and tips about places
★ It is your guide when you are traveling to other cities like São Paulo, Rio, New York, etc.
★ Find discounts and deals from several establishments in the city or in your neighbourhood
★ Order food delivery or book a table

Guide Kekanto is the best city guide, made by real costumers reviews that transform their cities with information about what is good and what is not. Download for FREE now!
comments: para uso inicial, um pouco insatisfeita quanto a ausencia de opção para editar foto e nome do perfil. tripadvisor é excelente neste quesito. Quanto ao funcionamento do app, algum bug deve ter acontecido. Subir fotos vem sendo difícil quando não, impossível.
Melhor lugar para ver opiniões de lugares
Don't want notifications?  Too freaking bad. Also only includes a handful of places,  usually the less remarkable ones.

Brazilian Yelp I love this app and website. It has been very helpful while visiting Brazil, finding some essential places and services, as well as finding the best places to eat and drink. I am not sure how much this is used outside of Brazil, but it is very similar to Yelp.
Helpful Ajuda a descobrir a cidade, mas de vez em quando falha, os locais não são tão bons como a recomendação diz
Excelente Muito bom app para se localizar onde não se conhece direito
recentChanges: ★ Kekanto is also integrated with transportation info from Citymapper!
★ Slightly updates in some components and many improvements. Enjoy the app's stability!
